Original meaning 本义: Meaning lady's vanity case.

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 匳 from box 匚𠥓匸 fāng-xì and phonetic together (佥)僉 qiān C360 奩<匳匲籢> simp 奁.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- 籢 is the oldest version) (- 籢 a bamboo 𥫗 box with a collection 斂 of stuff) (- 匳 a box 匚 pronounced like lian 僉) (- 奩 a big 大 box 匚 with stuff 品) (- 匲 a box 匚 with big 大 stuff 品)

匳字的基本解释

匳
lián
同“奁”。

匳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》力鹽切，平鹽，來。］
亦作“匲1”。亦作“奩1”。亦作“籢1”。
(1)古代盛香物或盛放梳妆用品的器具。型制多为精致轻巧的小匣子。如镜奁，脂粉奁。引申指陪嫁财物。如奁资。参见“匳贈”。
(2)盛放东西的箱盒。

匳字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【匚字部】　匳； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页154第23
【唐韻】【正韻】力鹽切【集韻】【韻會】離鹽切，?音廉。【說文】本作籢。鏡籢也。今作匳。又【廣韻】盛香器也。【韻會】俗作奩。

匳字的源字形

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Guangyun" cut salt with force, flat salt, come. ]
Also known as "匲1". Also known as "奁1". Also known as "籢1".
(1) Ancient incense or toiletry utensils. The models are mostly exquisite and lightweight small boxes. Like a mirror, powdered powder. By extension, it refers to dowry property. Such as the capital. See "Gifts".
(2) Boxes for holding things.
Sulking
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [匚字部] 　匳; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 154 23
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Cut the salt with strength [Jiyun] [Rhyme] Cut from the salt, the sound is clean. [Said the text] This is a 籢. Mirror 籢 also. This is 匳. Also [Guangyun] Incense holder. [Rhyme Club] Vulgarly written.
